title: Find k for to solve FTC question

content.question:
If n is a known positive integer, for what value of k is <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" aria-label="the integral from 1 to k of x to the power of open parentheses n minus 1 close parentheses with respect to x equals 1 divided by n">
 <semantics>

 <mi>x</mi>

 <mi>n</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow>
 </msup>
 </mrow>
 </mrow>

</mstyle><mi>d</mi><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac>

 </mfrac>
 </mrow>

 </annotation>
</semantics>
</math>
?
